https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/l1bHryDSFWgiDbEdTf2H7vQAKCp.jpg Marianne leaves Abel for Paul, his best friend and the father of her unborn child. Eight years later, Paul dies and Marianne returns to Abel. However, things have changed for the both of them and feelings of jealousy surround their new relationship. A Faithful Man
